Data: Vettori to Hayden, no run good length ball angling into Hayden from over the wicket, Hayden flicks uppishly to midwicket
Vettori to Hayden, 1 wide strays down leg side, wide called
Vettori to Hayden, 1 run pitches outside off stump and turns quite a bit back into Hayden who plays back and dabs it to point for one
Vettori to Ponting, no run lots of turn on offer, Vettori pitches that outside of fstump and spins away, Ponting reaches out for it and defends to cover
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run cut past point on the back foot for a single
Vettori to Hayden, no run pushed through quickly outside of stump, Hayden gets his pad outside the line and pads it away

Vettori to Hayden, no run Hayden tries to sweep and gets a thick bottom edge and the ball bounces into the ground and then balloons up off the pad, McCullum catches it and the New Zealanders appeal, Umpire Taufel asks for the third umpire and he rules it not out, that hit ground just
Patel to Ponting, no run fuller delivery, played back to Patel
Patel to Ponting, no run arm ball, Ponting pushes forward and gets beaten
Patel to Ponting, no run comes forward and defends to the on side
Patel to Ponting, no run quicker delivery on the off stump line, played to square leg
Patel to Ponting, 1 run comes forward and drives wide of cover for a single
Patel to Hayden, no run pushes off the back foot back down the track to Patel
Vettori to Ponting, no run comes forward and defends to the off side
Vettori to Ponting, 2 runs good drift from Vettori, looking to play to the on side gets a leading edge to thirdman
Vettori to Ponting, no run defended on the front foot to cover
Vettori to Ponting, 2 runs short ball bit quicker, cut off the back foot to deep backward-point
Vettori to Ponting, no run comes forward and defends to cover
Vettori to Ponting, no run tossed up outside the off stump, driven to mid off
Patel to Hayden, no run a touch short, cut to cover, Taylor does well diving to his left
Patel to Hayden, 1 run driven to mid on for a single
Patel to Ponting, no run comes forward and defends, inside edge onto the pads and then rolls along to the off side
Patel to Ponting, 1 run tossed up bit fuller, driven down the ground to long on
Patel to Hayden, 1 run cuts off the back foot, Taylor at extra-cover misfields
Patel to Ponting, 2 runs cuts off the back foot to deep backward-point to pick up couple of runs
Vettori to Hayden, no run moves forward and pushes to the on side
Vettori to Hayden, no run works to midwicket
Vettori to Hayden, no run moves back and works to the on side
Vettori to Hayden, 1 run driven down the ground to long on to pick up a single
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run on the leg stump line, driven down the ground to long on
Vettori to Hayden, no run nicely tossed up delivery on the good length, comes forward and defends to short midwicket
Patel to Ponting, no run comes forward and works to the on side
Patel to Ponting, 1 run comes down the track and looks to drive down the ground, mishits it slightly in the air to deep mid on for a single
Patel to Hayden, no run played to the on side
Patel to Hayden, no run sweeps and misses, off the pad to the off side
Patel to Hayden, (no ball) 1 run swept down to fine leg for a single
Patel to Ponting, no run
Patel to Ponting, 2 runs short of a len gth outside off stump, Ponting cuts down to third man for two
Vettori to Hayden, 1 run a touch short on off and middle stump, Hayden plays back and forces it to long-on for a single
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run turned behind square for one
Vettori to Hayden, no run driven back to the bowler on the front foot
Vettori to Hayden, no run tossed up on off and middle, Hayden comes down the track and defends
Vettori to Hayden, no run good length ball on off stump and turning into Hayden who plays it to midwicket
Vettori to Hayden, no run a touch shorter on off stump, Hayden goes right back and works it off his pads to midwicket
Patel to Ponting, 1 run drifting on to middle and leg stump, Ponting moves across and flicks it off his pads
Patel to Hayden, 2 runs tossed up on off stump, Hayden tries to sweep and gets a top edge that lobs behind square leg
Patel to Hayden, 1 run full toss angling into leg stump, Hayden pushes it to long- on for a single
Patel to Ponting, 1 run good length outside off stump, Ponting reaches out for it and flicks it in the air through midwicket
Patel to Hayden, no run pitching outside off stump and turning away from Hayden who gets a thick outside edge to point
Patel to Hayden, 1 run short and wide outside off stump, Hayden rocks back and cuts through the cover point region
Vettori to Hayden, no run defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Vettori to Hayden, no run played to midwicket on the back foot
Vettori to Hayden, 1 run tossed up on off and middle, Hayden steps down and smothers the spin and dabs it to mid-on for one
Vettori to Ponting, no run pushed flat through the air on off and middle, Ponting plays forward and pushes it to point, Hayden sets off for the single but Ponting sends him back
Vettori to Ponting, no run defended to midwicket on the front foot
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run floated through the air on off stump, Ponting lunges forward and has to wait for the ball to come to him, he angles it towards point with the open face of the bat
Patel to Ponting, no run Ponting plays forward again and tries to defend, he gets an inside edge to midwicket
Patel to Ponting, no run cut to short third man on the back foot
Patel to Ponting, 1 run fullish length outside off stump, Ponting goes on the front foot and square drives through point

Patel to Hayden, 2 runs pitches outside off stump and turning away from Hayden, Patel bowled that a bit quicker and Hayden used the pace to guide it down to third man, Ponting wanted the third but slipped after he completed the single
Patel to Hayden, FOUR runs swept fine down to fine leg for four, Hayden didn't connect that perfectly but he got it fine enough, that's the first boundary in ten overs
Patel to Hayden, 1 run pushed to mid-on off the front foot
Gillespie to Hayden, no run good length ball on middle stump, Hayden plays back and defends on the leg side
Gillespie to Hayden, 1 run short of a length ball pitching on middle and off and angling away from Hayden who runs it down to third man
Gillespie to Ponting, 1 run good length ball on off stump, Ponting pushes it off the front foot to Vincent at point, he doesn't collect it cleanly and Hayden calls Ponting through for the single
Gillespie to Hayden, 1 run tight line and length on off stump, Hayden dabs it into the covers for another quick single, Australia bring up their 100
Gillespie to Ponting, no run defended to cover on the front foot

Gillespie to Ponting, no run full ball on off stump, Ponting moves across and falls over a touch, he gets an outside edge to point, Hayden sets off for the single but changes his mind and runs back, just three runs of that Powerplay over.

Oram to Hayden, no run pitches on a good length outside off stump, Hayden tires to muscle it through midwicket by stepping down the track, Taylor scampers across, picks up and tries to run ot Ponting at the non-striker's end
Oram to Hayden, no run pushed to midwicket on the front foot
Oram to Hayden, 2 runs how lucky is Hayden today! Oram bangs one short, Hayden goes down on one knee and tries to slog-pull/sweep it, he gets a top edge over short fine leg
Oram to Hayden, FOUR runs short of a length ball, Hayden gets on top of the balla nd steers it through gully for four to the third man fence, well-controlled shot that was
Oram to Hayden, no run dropped short outside off stump, Hayden waits for it and cuts firmly but hits it to the man at point
Oram to Hayden, no run good length ball on off stump, Hayden pushes to covers on the back foot
Gillespie to Ponting, FOUR runs Gillespie drops it short, Ponting moves forward and pulls majestically over midwicket for four, top shot
Gillespie to Ponting, no run good length ball outside off stump, Ponting lunges forward, opens the face and angles it to point
Gillespie to Ponting, no run just short of a length on off and middle stump, Ponting defends back to the bowler
Gillespie to Ponting, FOUR runs glorious shot, Ponting knew fine leg was in the circle, so he moved across to one that was full on the pads and flicked it in the air and down to the fine leg fence
Gillespie to Ponting, 1 run short of a length ball on off stump, Ponting moves forward and plays it behind point and down to third man for a single
Gillespie to Hayden, 1 run just a fraction short and Hayden moves back quickly and pulls through midwicket to retain strike, he moves on to 47
Oram to Hayden, no run good length on off stump from Oram, Hayden blocks it back to the bowler
Oram to Hayden, 1 run slower ball ends up as a full toss on off stump, Hayden drives to McMillan at long-on for a single
Oram to Ponting, 1 run a fraction short, just a fraction and Ponting is so quick to rock back, swivel and pull to deep midwicket

Oram to Hayden, FOUR runs that's Hayden's fifty! Oram drifted down leg side with his fine leg in the circle, Hayden pulls it wide of that man and collects four, he's had a lot of luck but you got to make it count, Hayden's done that, well played
Oram to Hayden, 1 run pulled in front of square this time, Oram is bowling far too short at his gentle pace
Oram to Ponting, no run defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Gillespie to Hayden, 1 run on a good length but too wide outside off stump, Hayden uses the width and runs it down to third man for a single
Gillespie to Ponting, no run good length ball angling into Ponting rom outside off stump, played to point on the back foot

Gillespie to Ponting, FOUR runs a touch too full and Ponting lunches on the front foot and lofts it over mid-on, he's timed that superbly for he hardly hit that with any effort, the ball bounces once before reaching the fence, that's the 100 partnership between these two
Gillespie to Ponting, 2 runs flicked off his pads in front of midwicket for two more
Gillespie to Ponting, no run good length and straight, Ponting hammers the drive back at Gillespie who gets his boot in the way and saves a certain boundary

Gillespie to Ponting, 1 run Ponting cuts on the front foot to Fulton at covers who misfields to allow the single, Ponting reaches fifty too, he's played a perfect innings, I can't remember his playing a false shot
Patel to Ponting, 1 run a touch short outside off stump, Ponting plays it late to short third man, Hayden calls him through for a sharp single
Patel to Hayden, no run bowled flat on off stump from round the wicket, Hayden plays it back to Patel
Patel to Hayden, 1 run fuller length on middle stump, Hayden closes the face and works it through square leg
Patel to Ponting, no run played to cover on the back foot, Ponting mis-timed that and he's not happy with himself
Patel to Ponting, no run pushed to midwicket on the front foot
Patel to Ponting, no run full ish length again, Ponting moves forward and plays it to midwicket
Vettori to Hayden, 2 runs beats Hayden in the flight and Hayden cuts to backward point where a fumble allows him to come back for the second
Vettori to Hayden, no run flighted quicker through teh air, Hayden comes forward and drives back to Vettori
Vettori to Hayden, 1 run a touch short this time, Hayden pulls to deep backward square
Vettori to Ponting, no run defended to backward point on the front foot
Vettori to Ponting, 2 runs fuller length on off stump, Ponting drives in the air but wide of cover
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run tossed up on off stump, Ponting plays forward with soft hands and drops it short on the off side for a single
Patel to Ponting, 1 run Ponting takes a step down to Patel and flicks him through midwicket, a little in the air but there's no fielder there
Patel to Hayden, FOUR runs shot! Hayden steps out to Patel, meets the ball on the bounce and lofts dead straight back over Patel's head, that was hit with so much power
Patel to Hayden, no run driven uppishly just short of the man at cover
Patel to Hayden, 2 runs dabbed through midwicket on the front foot, there's huge gap there and they manage to run two
Patel to Hayden, no run Patel drops it short and wide outside off stump, Hayden tries to cut but doesn't time it well
Patel to Hayden, 2 runs pitches on off stump and spins away from Hayden who moes across and closes the face to place it in that huge gap at midwicket, two more
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run flat ball outside off stump, Ponting waits on the back foot and cuts to deep point
Vettori to Hayden, no run blowed flat and fast on off and midde, Hayden plays back and defends to midwicket
Vettori to Hayden, no run full outside off stump, Hayden goes down on one knee and drives to cover
Vettori to Hayden, 1 run tossed up outside of stump, Hayden plays right back and cuts through point
Vettori to Ponting, no run tight line on off stump, Ponting gets forward and defends to cover

Vettori to Ponting, no run lovely ball, the flight drew Ponting forward, the ball pitched on off stump and Ponting was well and turly beaten perhaps for the first time in the innings, the ball spun past the outside edge
McMillan to Hayden, 1 run fullish length on off stump, Hayden drives to long-off for one
McMillan to Ponting, 1 run full again from McMillan on off stump, Ponting plays forward and drives to long-off
McMillan to Hayden, 1 run short of a length on middle and off, Hayden waits for it, comes forward and drives to long-on
McMillan to Ponting, 1 run Ponting punches down to long-off for one more, they are milking the singles off McMillan
McMillan to Hayden, 1 run full on the pads, Hayden punches down the ground to long-on again
McMillan to Ponting, 1 run 112kmh on off and middle, Ponting moves across and drives to long-on, that's six singles off that over, all of them gown the ground
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run tossed up on middle and off, Ponting moves forward and pushes it past Vettori for a single
Vettori to Hayden, 1 run dropped short and angling down leg side, Hayden whips it behind square for a single
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run full ball outside off stump, Ponting drives through cover on the front foot for a single
Vettori to Hayden, 1 run bowled short outside off stump and spinning back into Hayden who moves on the back foot and cuts in front of point for a single
Vettori to Ponting, 2 runs tossed up on middle and off stump, Ponting plays an inside out chip shot over the fielder at cover, that looked dangerous but it was placed well
Vettori to Ponting, no run defended to covers on the front foot
Taylor to Hayden, 1 run wide outside off stump, cut down the third man
Taylor to Ponting, 2 wide slips very wide down leg side, it beats McCullum and the batsmen run one too
Taylor to Hayden, 1 run pulled in the air wide off the fielder at midwicket, that wasn
Taylor to Ponting, 1 run flicked off the pads behind square for one
Taylor to Hayden, no run Hayden tries to play a late cut but it was too close to him, he gets beaten
Taylor to Hayden, FOUR runs short and wide outside the off stump, Hayden moves back and cuts hard, he's timed and placed that really wella nd it beats the man on the fence at deep point
Taylor to Hayden, no run what's he doing?? Taylor pitched that outside off stump and turning away from Hayden who goes down on one knee and swats it down with an almost straight bat, curious shot
Mills to Ponting, no run good length wide outside off stump, Ponting tries to cut but the length isn't right for the shot, he bottom edges it on the off side
Mills to Ponting, no run good length just outside off stump and angling into Ponting who gets forward and defends back to Mills
Mills to Ponting, 1 run full toss on off stump, Ponting drives down the ground for a single
Mills to Hayden, no run good length ball on middle and off stump, Hayden comes down the track and yorks himself, digs it out back to Mills
Mills to Hayden, 1 run dropped a touch short and Hayden pulls it away to deep square leg for one
Mills to Ponting, 1 run fullish ball on off and middle, Ponting leans across and drives wide of the fielder at mid-on for one
Taylor to Ponting, 2 runs tossed up on middle an leg, Ponting pushes it through midwicket and Hayden pushes him to run two runs, excellent running
Taylor to Ponting, 1 run worked off the pads behind square for one

Taylor to Hayden, 1 run dropped! Hayden swept that powerfully from outside of stump, he absolutely smashed that at Hamish Marshall at midwicket, he just couldn't hang on to the catch, Marshall is on the field as a substitute, that
Taylor to Ponting, 1 run swept to deep backward square for one
Taylor to Hayden, 1 run short and wide outside off stump, Hayden cuts to deep point
Taylor to Ponting, 1 run full ball on off and middle stump, Ponting drives down the ground for a single
Mills to Ponting, no run full ball swinging back into Ponting's off stump, driven on the front foot to cover
Mills to Ponting, no run full again just outside off stump, Ponting gives it a thump but hits it straight to mid-off
Mills to Ponting, 1 run dropped a fraction short, Ponting goes down on one knee and pulls through midwicket, Fleming has protection in the deep
Mills to Hayden, 3 runs slower ball on good length on off stump and angling away from Hayden who tries to hit over cover, he gets a thick edge that clears the infield
Mills to Ponting, no run well bowled, right up there in the blockhole, Ponting digs it out to mid-off
Mills to Ponting, 1 run full again and on middle and leg stump, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
Oram to Ponting, 2 runs dropped a touch short, Ponting swivels and pulls down to deep square leg where Fleming has a man on the fence

Oram to Ponting, no run McCullum is standing up to the stumps and he does a fantastic job of collecting one that bounced sharply outside the off stump, Ponting misses the cut and McCullum whips off the bails in a flash, Ponting just got his foot back in time
Oram to Ponting, no run cut to point on the front foot
Oram to Ponting, 1 run short outside the off stump, Ponting swings it away through midwicket on the back foot

Oram to Hayden, FOUR runs excellent improvisation, Oram angles that into Hayden from round the wicket, trying to cramp hi for room, Hayden moves towards the leg side and cuts hard over the gully region for four runs
Oram to Hayden, 1 run Oram bowls this just short of a length on off and middle, Hayden plays back and pulls to deep midwicket for a single to end the over
Mills to Hayden, no run good ball nearly in Hayden's blockhole, he digs it out on the front foot back to the bowler
Mills to Hayden, 2 runs full ball on midle and off stump, Hayden biffs it down the ground, Vettori runs across from long-on and saves the four
Mills to Hayden, FOUR runs the slower ball, Hayden tries to heave it over the off side but gets an outside edge that runs fine of the fielder at short third man, four more
Mills to Hayden, FOUR runs smashed down the ground again, Vettori can

Mills to Hayden, 2 runs full ball on the pads, Hayden flicks it off the toes behind square for two runs, that's his hundred! He's had a lot of luck with three dropped catches, Vettori dropped him on 0 in fact, but well played Haydos!
Mills to Hayden, FOUR runs shirt ball from Mills and Hayden loves it, he smashes that through midwicket for four more, he's switching into overdrive now

Oram to Ponting, FOUR runs Ponting slashes hard outside the off stump, that was on a good length and Ponting's outside edge flies over short third man for four more, New Zealand are bleeding during this Powerplay
Oram to Ponting, 1 run full ball on off stump, Ponting smashed that back at Oram, that was a catch in theory, only in theory mind yyou for it was hit extremely hard
Oram to Hayden, FOUR runs Hayden's blazing hot now, Oram bowls that a touch too full and Hayden powers it through midwicket for four runs
Oram to Hayden, FOUR runs full toss on off stump, Hayden makes room and bashes it wide off the fielder at mid-off for four more
Oram to Hayden, FOUR runs another one sails away, Hayden picks that from a full length and whacks it down the ground just wide of the fielder at long-on, one-bounce four
Oram to Hayden, no run defended on the off side, 17 from that over to follow the previous over that leaked 16
Vettori to Ponting, no run good length on off stump, Ponting reaches for it and drives to cover
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run flat ball on off stump, Ponting opens the face and runs it to point, they take a quick single to bring up the 200 partnership
Vettori to Hayden, no run full ball on off stump, Hayden backs away and slams it to covers, he was cramped for room, well bowled
Vettori to Hayden, OUT bowled him! Hayden gave him the charge and was beaten by the flight, he missed his heave over the leg side and the ball rattled the off stump
Vettori to Clarke, no run excellent ball on off stump, tight line and length, Clarke drives back to Vettori
Vettori to Clarke, no run tossed up on off and middle, Clarke comes down the track and defends, what a brilliant over from Vettori
Patel to Ponting, no run hits a good length outside off stump and spins back into Ponting, inducing an inside edge
Patel to Ponting, no run defended on teh front foot back down the pitch
Patel to Ponting, 2 runs full ball on middle and leg stump, Ponting flicks through midwicket and Clarke, who's nice and fresh, runs two easily
Patel to Ponting, FOUR runs flicked superbly off his pads and the placement is excellent to, fours runs to deep midwicket&
Patel to Ponting, SIX runs straight hit goes the distance, Ponting steps down and hammers Patel down the ground, the ball just clears the fence
Patel to Ponting, 1 wide drifts down leg side, wide called
Patel to Ponting, 1 run full ball on middle and leg, Ponting drives down to long-on for one
Vettori to Ponting, 2 runs dabbed with gentle hands into the massive gap at midwicket, Ponting, as tired as he is, races through for two runs
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run dabbed to short third man on the front foot, Clarke sprints through for a single
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run short and wide outside the off stump, Clarke cuts through point for one
Vettori to Ponting, 1 run full on the pads, Ponting pushes through midwicket for a single, he's on 99
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run full ball on off stump, Clarke pushes down the ground to long off for one
Vettori to Ponting, no run defended on the front foot to covers, Pontign stays on 99.
Patel to Clarke, 2 runs short ball on off and middle, Clarke rocks back and pulls powerfully to deep midwicket where Marshall does the fielding, two runs
Patel to Clarke, 1 run Clarke uses his feet to step down the pitch and drive to long-on
Patel to Ponting, 1 run full ball on the pads, Ponting nonchalantly flicks off his legs for a single behind square, he gets a rousing ovation from the crowd, a superb innings
Patel to Clarke, 2 runs flicked off the pads through the leg side for a quick double

Patel to Clarke, OUT caught at deep midwicket, Clarke tries to clear the midwicket boundary, he hits that really hard but doesn't get the necessary elevation, he picks out Hamish Marshall in the deep who takes the catch at knee height
Patel to Ponting, 1 run Ponting clips it down to long-on for a single
McMillan to Ponting, FOUR runs cheeky but very effective, Ponting waits for the ball to nearly pass him before bring his bat down to play the late cut that runs fine to the third man fence
McMillan to Ponting, 2 runs flicked off the pads for two runs behind square leg
McMillan to Ponting, 1 run driven down the ground to long-off for a single
McMillan to Symonds, 1 run good length ball on off stump, Symonds pushes to long-off for one
McMillan to Ponting, 1 run pushed into cover for a single
McMillan to Symonds, 1 run short of a length drifting on to the pads, Symonds plays it through midwicket for one
Patel to Symonds, SIX runs there she blows! Symonds gives Patel the charge and lofts him high high high over the long-on fence, that's a massive hit
Patel to Symonds, 1 run chipped to long-off for one
Patel to Ponting, 1 run Ponting works it down the ground for one more
Patel to Symonds, 1 run full ball on off stump, driven to long-off for another single
Patel to Ponting, no run full ball on the pads, Ponting tries to paddle it fine but hits it to short fine leg
Patel to Ponting, 1 run full ball on leg stump, Ponting drives to long-on for one more, that's the end of Patel's spell

McMillan to Ponting, OUT Ponting falls after a colossal innings, he pulls that from outside off stump and didn't connect as well as he would have liked, the ball soars high and straight to Fulton at deep midwicket
McMillan to Symonds, 2 runs slower ball on middle stump, Symonds pushes that through midwicket and the batsmen run an easy two
McMillan to Symonds, SIX runs brute force! Symnonds backs away and cross-bats it straight down the ground, thats a very flat six, awesome power from Symonds
McMillan to Symonds, no run he can be delicate too, Symonds tries to paddle sweep that but doesn't make contact
McMillan to Symonds, 1 run driven down the ground for a single
McMillan to Hussey, 1 run short of a length ball on middle stump, Hussey turns it off his pads for a single
Gillespie to Hussey, no run good length angling into Hussey's off and middle stump, he gets a leading edge back to the bowler
Gillespie to Hussey, 2 wide full and wide down leg side, McCullum doesn
Gillespie to Symonds, 2 runs Gillespie bounces Symonds outside the off stump, he flat bats it high over midwicket, he didn't connect that properly but the ball falls safe
Gillespie to Symonds, 2 runs Symonds tries to heave it over cover but gets a top-edge down to third man
Gillespie to Symonds, 1 run full ball on the pads, Symonds moves away to square leg and Gillespie follows him, played to midwicket for one
Gillespie to Hussey, 1 run Hussey tries to hit it too hard down the ground, gets an inside edge on to pad for a single to the off side
Gillespie to Symonds, OUT bowled him with the yorker! Symonds makes room but moving away towards leg side, Gillespie fires in the yorker and Symonds misses it, the ball crashes into the stumps
Mills to Hussey, 1 run full ball on middle and off, dug out into the covers
Mills to White, 1 leg bye short of a length ball on middle and leg, White moves across and tries to tickle it to fine leg, the ball hits him on the thigh and they run a leg bye
Mills to Hussey, no run full ball on off stump, Hussey squeezes it to midwicket
Mills to Hussey, no run full ball in the blockhole, Hussey plays it to covers, this is excellent bowling

Mills to Hussey, SIX runs full toss on off and middle, Hussey steps down and cross-bats it flat and down to long on, big Jacob Oram jumps up to try and catch it but the ball just hits the tip of his fingers and crosses the fence
Mills to Hussey, 2 runs played down to long-on for two more to end the over
Gillespie to White, 1 leg bye drifting on to the pads, white moves across and gets hit on the thigh pad, another leg bye on the leg side
Gillespie to Hussey, 1 run low and full on off stump, Hussey pushes it into covers for one
Gillespie to White, no run defended to midwicket on the front foot
Gillespie to White, 1 run short and wide outside the off stump, White biffs it through covers on the back foot for one
Gillespie to Hussey, (no ball) 1 run he over-steps, Hussey gets a inside edge on to his pad and they run a very sharp single with the ball very near the stumps
Gillespie to White, no run the yorker outside off stump, White defends it to cover, great ball from Gillespie

Gillespie to White, SIX runs short ball and White gives it a mighty pull, Lou vincent runs to his left on the boundary and dives full length , the ball goes wide of his outstretched hand and bounces on the rope, it's signalled six!
Mills to Hussey, 1 run
Mills to White, 2 runs
Mills to White, FOUR runs White tries to heave it down the ground but gets an inside egde down to fine leg for four
Mills to White, 1 run pulled through midwicket for a single
Mills to Hussey, SIX runs what a shot! Hussey moves down the pitch and towards leg stump to make room and lofts it over extra cover, he's timed it brilliantly and it sails over the fence
Mills to Hussey, no run the yorker to end the over, Hussey charges again and gets an inside edge back to the bowler
Gillespie to White, 2 runs fullish length on off stump, white heaves it down the ground for two to long-on
Gillespie to White, 3 runs full ball on off stump and White launches it over extra cover, that's an inside out shot and he gets three for his effort
Gillespie to Hussey, SIX runs that's his third six! Hussey swings that with the angle high and far over midwicket, that's a massive hit
Gillespie to Hussey, 1 run full ball on off stump, Hussey drives down the ground for one
Gillespie to White, 1 run Gillespie bowls the yorker and White digs it out for a single to point
Gillespie to Hussey, 2 runs full toss on off stump, Hussey flat-bats it down the ground, it's hit very straight and gets two runs

Australia have finished on a massive 343 for 5. Hayden and Ponting set the innings up with outstanding hundreds and Hussey provided the spurt at the end. New Zealand have a massive challenge on their hands. I'll be back in a short while for their innings.
It will be Lee to open the bowling. He has two slips in place and is charging in from over the wicket to Vincent.

The players are out in the middle ready to begin the second innings. New Zealand need 344 to win at 6.88 runs per over. Stephen Fleming and Lou Vincent are the openers. They are really up against it for Australia have a powerful bowling attack with Glenn McGrath and Nathan Bracken returning
Lee to Vincent, 1 run New Zealand are away first ball, that was pitched on a good length on off and middle, Vincent drops it with gentle hands on the leg side for a quick single
Lee to Fleming, 1 run drifts on to the pads, Fleming clips it down to fine leg for one
Lee to Vincent, no run 143kmh, in the channel outside off stump, Vincent gets his front foor forward and lets it go
Lee to Vincent, 1 run short of a length ball angling into the hips, Vincent plays it down behind square on the leg side for one more
Lee to Fleming, no run fullish length pitching outside off stump and angling away from Fleming who plays back and across and gets beaten
Lee to Fleming, no run excellent ball to finish, pitching on a good length on off stump, Fleming plays back again and trusts the bounce enough to let it go over the top of off stump
Bracken to Vincent, no run pitches on a good length outside off stump and slants away from the right-hander, Vincent lets it go
Bracken to Vincent, no run and again, this was pitched closer to off stump and Vincent shoulders arms again
Bracken to Vincent, 1 run short of a length ball on leg stump, Vincent pushes it off his hips behind square leg for a single
Bracken to Fleming, 1 wide pitches wide outside off stump and swings wider away from the left hander, that's the first extra Australia have conceded
Bracken to Fleming, 1 run angling into leg stump and Fleming dabs it behind square on the leg side for a sharp single
Bracken to Vincent, no run short of a length on leg and middle, that stopped on Vincent who closed the face too early and got a leading edge that falls short of point
Bracken to Vincent, no run slower ball at 124kmh, Vincent fends at it outside the off stump and gets beaten
Lee to Fleming, no run short ball outside off stump, Fleming drops his wrists and lets it go through to Gilchrist
Lee to Fleming, no run good length ball on middle and off stump, Fleming plays it back to Lee on the back foot
Lee to Fleming, 1 run full ball outside off stump, Fleming drives away from his body and gets a thick edge down to McGrath at third man
Lee to Vincent, no run tight line and length on off stump at 146kmh, Vincent gets behind the line and defends to point

Lee to Vincent, no run outstanding shot and a superb save prevents four, Vincent drives off the back foot and timed it really well, Symonds dives to his left at cover and fields with one hand, outstanding
Lee to Vincent, 1 run dabbed wide of Symonds and they try to steal a single, Symonds sprints to his left picks up and shies at the batsman's end, Fleming was gone had he hit
Bracken to Vincent, no run good length ball pitching on off stump and moving away from Vincent who plays back and defends on the off side
Bracken to Vincent, no run slower ball, pitching on off stump, drawing Vincent forward and the ball moves away off the pitch and beats the outside edge
Bracken to Vincent, no run 142 kmh this time, not that short outside off stump, Vincent tried to pull but got a leading edge to mid-off
Bracken to Vincent, no run slower again at 121 kmh, Bracken is mixing it up well, Vincent gets on the front foot and defends

Bracken to Vincent, FOUR runs half-volley outside off stump and Vincent meets it on the pitch and slams it through covers for four, that's the first boundary of the innings, New Zealand need many more
Bracken to Vincent, no run pitches outside off stump and slants away from Vincent who moves back and lets it go
Lee to Fleming, no run banged in short on off stump, Fleming stands tall and defends on the off side

Lee to Fleming, no run good length ball pitching on off stump, Fleming came forward and tried to drive through covers but the ball moved away from him and beate the edge, Fleming was very late on the shot
Lee to Fleming, 1 run Fleming plants his foot forward again and throws his bat hard at the ball, trying to hit it through covers, he gets an outside edge to third man
Lee to Vincent, no run slower ball at 128 kmh, that pitches outside off stump and holds it's line, Vincent lets it go
Lee to Vincent, no run short of a length ball on off stump, Vincent gets behind the line and defends towards cover
Lee to Vincent, no run tight line and length, angling intio the right-hander's off and middle stump, Vincent defends on the front foot
Bracken to Fleming, FOUR runs that's a half-volley and Fleming accepts it with glee, he leans forward and caresses it back past mid-on and times it well enough to get four

Bracken to Fleming, 2 leg byes Bracken bowls this a touch shorter and Fleming plays it on the of side, they scamper through for one and Clarke fires in the throw at the bowler's end and concedes overthrows
Bracken to Fleming, FOUR runs Fleming slashes outside the off stump and gets an edge past second slip for four to third man
Bracken to Fleming, FOUR runs another superb on-drive, Bracken bowled it full again, Fleming leans forward and punches down the ground for four more
Bracken to Fleming, FOUR runs and another! This time Bracken slips down leg side, Fleming moves across and flicks it fine down to the fine-leg fence

Bracken to Fleming, no run good length ball on off stump, Fleming tries to cut but the ball is too close to the body for that shot, he gets a bottom edge, 18 runs off that over, a great one for New Zealand
Lee to Vincent, no run full and straight from Lee, Vincent gets forward and drives firmly back to Lee
Lee to Vincent, no run 147kmh on off and middle stump, Vincent presses forward and defends on the leg side
Lee to Vincent, 1 run good length ball but drifting on to the pads, worked in front of midwicket for one
Lee to Fleming, no run Lee bangs in the bouncer and Fleming ducks under it
Lee to Fleming, no run short of a length on off stump, Fleming stands tall on the back foot and plays it down to point
Lee to Fleming, no run short of a length ball pitching on middle and angling across Fleming, he plays it with a flat-bat to cover
McGrath to Vincent, no run on target with his first ball, good length on off stump, Vincent plays forward and blocks
McGrath to Vincent, SIX runs what a hit! Vincent plonked his front foot forward and hit with sheer power through the line, he has a lovely swing of the bat, the ball soars over the long-off fence
McGrath to Vincent, no run McGrath picthes this a touch short on off stump, Vincent defends on the back foot
McGrath to Vincent, no run short of a length and wide outside off stump, Vincent gave him the charge and tried to hit it through the off side, the ball seamed away from him and beat the outside edge
McGrath to Vincent, no run defended on the front foot towards cover
McGrath to Vincent, no run good length and line again from McGrath, just around off stump, Vincent waits on the back foot and pushes it to the off side
Lee to Fleming, no run short and wide outside off stump, Fleming chases it and tries to hit that through point, the ball angles away from him and the bounce takes it over the upper edge of the bat
Lee to Fleming, no run much shorter in length and straighter as well, Fleming punches to mid-off on the front foot
Lee to Fleming, no run defended to point with an open face
Lee to Fleming, FOUR runs Lee bangs it short and Fleming is quick to spot his opportunity, he gets into position for the pull shot and sends it over square leg for four
Lee to Fleming, no run short of a length again from Lee, not as short as the previous one, Fleming fends it away from off stump towards cover
Lee to Fleming, FOUR runs width offered outside off stump and Fleming places the square drive to perfection, four more to end the over, New Zealand are picking up steam
McGrath to Vincent, 1 run defended on the off side and they take a sharp single
McGrath to Fleming, no run good length ball on off stump, Fleming leans forward and defends towards cover point

McGrath to Fleming, OUT pitches on off stump and angles away from Fleming who tries to cut, it was far too close to the body for that shot and he gets an edge through to Gilchrist, McGrath gets the breakthrough for Australia in his second over
McGrath to Fulton, no run hits a perfect length outside off stump and holds its line, Fulton lets it go
McGrath to Fulton, no run defended towards cover on the back foot
McGrath to Fulton, no run fullish length angling into off and middle stump, Fulton waits for it and defends back to the bowler
Bracken to Vincent, no run bowls the first one wide outside off stump, Vincent lets it go through to Gilchrist
Bracken to Vincent, no run what's he trying there? Bracken bowled that outside off stump, Vincent moved towards point and tried to chip it over short fine leg, he was beaten
Bracken to Vincent, no run this time he lets it go outside off stump
Bracken to Vincent, no run short of a length outside off stump, Vincent waits on the back foot and punches it to point
Bracken to Vincent, no run slower ball at 120kmh, Vincent came forward too early and his fend outside the off stump made contact with nothing
Bracken to Vincent, no run defended on the front foot towards cover, Bracken comes back really well after going for 18 in his last over, this one is a maiden
McGrath to Fulton, 1 run short of a length outside off stump, Fulton tries to square drive it but gets more of an edge to third man to get off the mark

McGrath to Vincent, FOUR runs streaky shot! Vincent charged down and McGrath saw him coming, he bowled it short and Vincent tried to flat-bat it down the ground, he got a thick edge over first slip for four
McGrath to Vincent, no run defended back to the bowler on the front foot
McGrath to Vincent, FOUR runs this time he pulls off that stroke, Vincent moves across towards the off side and paddles McGrath down to teh fine leg fence
McGrath to Vincent, 1 run dabbed wide of first slip on the back foot for a sharp single
McGrath to Fulton, no run short of a length on off stump, Fulton stands tall and drives in front of point, Ponting dives to his right and pulls off a one-handed save
Bracken to Vincent, 1 run fullish ball on off stump, driven to mid-off for one
Bracken to Fulton, no run pitches outside off stump and angles away from the batsman who lets it go
Bracken to Fulton, 2 runs excellent placement from Fulton, he punches past mid-off and times it well enough to get two
Bracken to Fulton, no run good length ball on off stump, Fulton gets forward and defends
Bracken to Fulton, no run short of a length outside off stump, driven to Symonds at cover point on the back foot
Bracken to Fulton, FOUR runs full ball on leg and middle, Fulton leans across and flicks in front of midwicket, the timing is excellent and he'll get four
McGrath to Vincent, 1 run eased away on the off side for and easy single
McGrath to Fulton, (no ball) McGrath oversteps. Short of a good length delivery outside the off stump and Fulton punches it away towards cover, no room for a single there
McGrath to Fulton, no run again punced away off the back-foot to the cover region

McGrath to Fulton, no run short of a good length delivery and in the channel outside the off stump, no room whatsoever. Fulton once again finds the fielder with a friendly looking punch of the back-foot
McGrath to Fulton, 1 run forced away towards extra cover and they scamper through for a single

McGrath to Vincent, 2 runs short of a good length delivery outside the off stump. Vincent goes for the upper cut and the ball flies off the edge to the third man region but falls well wide of the fielder moving across

McGrath to Vincent, FOUR runs slightly short and in the chanlle outside the off stump. Vincent goes hard at it, ball clips the inside edge and races away to the fine leg fence. Hussey's long chance ends in vain
Bracken to Fulton, no run good length delivery, angling across the right-hander. Fulton stands his ground and finds the man at cover
Bracken to Fulton, 1 run again angled across, bit of width on offer and Fulton runs it down to third man for an easy single

Bracken to Vincent, 1 run short of a good length delivery, again slanting across, Vincent opens the face of the bat and runs it away well wide of the fielder diving fielder at first slip, dangerous shot
Bracken to Fulton, 1 run punched away into the gap on the off side and a quick single is added to the total
Bracken to Vincent, no run defended on the front-foot
Bracken to Vincent, no run on the middle and off stump line, Vincent stands tall and pnches it away towards cover
McGrath to Fulton, 1 run width offered outside the off stump and Fulton goes hard at it, ball clips the outside edge and races away to third man
McGrath to Vincent, FOUR runs short ball on the stumps, nothing special there. Vincent quickly picks up the length and pulls it away to the long-leg fence
McGrath to Vincent, 1 run
McGrath to Fulton, no run punched off the back-foot to the short cover region
McGrath to Fulton, FOUR runs four more! New Zealand on the move now. Again touch short and that's pulled away in style through midwicket.
McGrath to Fulton, no run on the middle and off stump line, forced away towards cover
Johnson to Vincent, no run punched off the back-foot to cover point
Johnson to Vincent, no run good length delivery, on the middle and off stump line. Vincent is made to defend
Johnson to Vincent, no run slightly short and angling across, Vincent is sucked into the drive, looked as if he tried to pull away but the ball ripped past the outside edge
Johnson to Vincent, 3 runs driven well wide of the fielder inside the cricle, sweeper cover had lot of ground to cover and they scamper through for the third
Johnson to Fulton, FOUR runs take that! short and Fulton fetches it from outside the off stump, ball races away to the midwicket fence. He is looking good here
Johnson to Fulton, FOUR runs even better! Bracken pitches it up outside the off stump and Fulton drills it through extra cover.
Lee to Vincent, FOUR runs driven in the air towards mid-on and McGrath jumping high gets a touch on it but fails to hold on to the ball, half a chance
Lee to Vincent, 2 runs eased away for a brace, to keep it simple
Lee to Vincent, FOUR runs another french cut, Vincent was looking to drive through covers and the ball raced away off the inside edge to the fine leg fence
Lee to Vincent, no run worked away towards sqare leg, fielder moves across quickly and cuts off the single
Lee to Vincent, no run punched away off the back-foot to the fully region
Lee to Vincent, no run forced away towards extra cover and Symonds has a shy at the striker's end, Vincent smells leather and he is not happy about it
Johnson to Fulton, no run beaten outside the off stump and the ball sails through to Gilchrist
Johnson to Fulton, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, Fulton gets well forward and drives it straight to the fielder at extra cover

Johnson to Fulton, OUT and gone! good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, ball stayed bit low after hitting the deck. Fulton drives at it with no real footwook and the edge is produced. Hayden at wide first slip dives across to his left and takes a good low catch.
Johnson to Taylor, no run defended outside the off stump
Johnson to Taylor, 2 runs edged away towards third man and they sprint across for the second
Johnson to Taylor, no run on the stumps, defended
Lee to Vincent, no run sharp bouncer and Vincent ducks under it
Lee to Vincent, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, defended on the front-foot
Lee to Vincent, no run another bouncer and Vincent is late on this occasion, in the end it was just an awkward looking fend
Lee to Vincent, no run steps forward and drives it straight to the fielder at mid-off, yes and no calls and in the end they decide not to go for it
Lee to Vincent, no run short of a good length delivery, close to the off stump and shaping in a touch, Vincent is beaten all ends up
Lee to Vincent, 1 run punched off the back-foot and Vincent finds the gap on the off side, quick single to end the over
Johnson to Vincent, no run good length ball on middle and off stump, Vincent gets forward and defends
Johnson to Vincent, 1 run short ball gets high on Vincent, he gets on top of the bounce and angles it to Clarke who over-runs it at point and allows the single
Johnson to Taylor, 2 runs turned off the pads to deep backward square for two
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run Taylor tries to drive but gets a thick outside edge down to third man
Johnson to Vincent, no run defended to point of the back foot
Johnson to Vincent, FOUR runs Johnson drops a fraction short, Vincent latches on to it and hammers the pull short in front of midwicket for four, that was hit with a lot of power
Clarke to Taylor, no run defended back to the bowler
Clarke to Taylor, 2 leg byes Taylor tries to sweep but the ball spins away from him and hits the pad down to hird man
Clarke to Taylor, no run pushed back to the bowler on the front foot
Clarke to Taylor, no run bowled flat on middle and off stump, played back to Clarke
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run dabbed to short third man for a sharp single, Johnson picks up and hits the stumps at the bowler's end, Taylor's safe
Clarke to Vincent, 1 bye Vincent tries to sweep this time but gets beaten, Gilchrist fails to collect it and the batsmen run a bye
Symonds to Vincent, no run defended on the front foot to the off side
Symonds to Vincent, 1 leg bye pitches outside off stump, Vincent tries to reverse sweep but doesn't make proper contact
Symonds to Taylor, 1 run swept to deep backward square for one
Symonds to Vincent, 2 runs full toss on off and middle, paddled away to fine leg for two easy runs
Symonds to Vincent, no run tossed up on off stump, the batsman steps out but defends
Symonds to Vincent, 1 run paddled around the corner for a single to end the over
Clarke to Vincent, 2 runs drifting on to leg, Vincent chips it down to short fine leg for one
Clarke to Vincent, no run bowled flat on off stump, Taylor gets forward and blocks
Clarke to Vincent, no run Taylor tries to sweep but misses and gets hit on the chin
Clarke to Vincent, 1 run dabbed wide of point for one
Clarke to Taylor, no run that spun a long way from off stump and beat the outside edge
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run turned of fthe pads to midwicket for a sharp single
Symonds to Taylor, 1 run dropped a fraction short and Taylor pulls it but doesn
Symonds to Vincent, 1 wide pitches on leg and spins down leg side, wide called
Symonds to Vincent, 1 run dropped short on off and middle, played behind square on the leg side for one
Symonds to Taylor, FOUR runs short and wide outside off stump, Taylor waits for it and places the cut superbly, Hayden runs to his left on the boundary and dives but can't save it
Symonds to Taylor, 1 run played fine on the leg side for a single
Symonds to Vincent, 1 run worked through midwicket for one more
Symonds to Taylor, 1 run pitches on off stump and spins into Taylor who pulls through midwicket
Clarke to Taylor, no run beaten outside the off stump
Clarke to Taylor, no run defended to midwicket
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run

Clarke to Vincent, OUT trapped him lbw, Vincent tries to sweep and doesn't make proper contact, Clarke appeals confidently and the umpire says that's out, that's a poor decision because I don't think the ball hit the pad, replays showed the ball hitting the glove just in line of off s
Clarke to McMillan, 1 run drifts on to the pads, turned behind square for one
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run driven through covers for one
Symonds to Taylor, no run turned off the pads to square leg
Symonds to Taylor, 1 run short ball and Taylor pulls in the air to Cameron White at square leg who drops it, hard shot but fairly easy catch
Symonds to McMillan, no run defended back to the bowler
Symonds to McMillan, no run pushed to midwicket on the front foot
Symonds to McMillan, no run defended on the off side
Symonds to McMillan, FOUR runs Symonds drops it a touch short and McMillan cuts and cuts well enough to beat Lee at short third man
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run pushed through midwicket for one
Clarke to McMillan, OUT outstanding fielding! McMillan tries to drive but gets an outside edge to Johnson for one, Taylor calls for the single, McMillan isn
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run full ball on off stump, driven to deep point for a single
Clarke to Oram, no run tossed up on middle and off stump, Oram closes the face to play it to midwicket
Clarke to Oram, 1 run fuller length on leg stump, clipped off his toes behind square to get off the mark
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run bowled flat on off stump, Taylor pushes to long off for a single
Symonds to Taylor, no run beaten outsidethe off stump trying to cut one that was too close
Symonds to Taylor, 1 run worked down to fine leg for one
Symonds to Oram, 2 runs dropped short outside the off stump, pushed off the back foto to long of for one
Symonds to Oram, no run fired into the block hole full and fast, dug out on the off side
Symonds to Oram, no run defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Symonds to Oram, no run tossed up outside off stump, Oram plays forward and tries to defend, the ball spins away from him and past the outside edge
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run full toss outside off stump, Taylor tries to drive through cover but edges to short third man
Clarke to Oram, 1 run Oram moves across and plays the scoop shot to fine leg
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run driven through point for another single
Clarke to Oram, 1 run full toss on leg stump, Oram plays the reverse sweep through point for one
Clarke to Taylor, no run late cut to short third man, Johnson is quick to prevent the single
Clarke to Taylor, no run defended to mid-off on the front foot
Symonds to Oram, 1 run pushed into the covers for a single
Symonds to Taylor, no run fullish length on off and middle, flicked to square leg
Symonds to Taylor, 5 wide drifts down leg side, the ball beats Gilchrist and runs down for five wides
Symonds to Taylor, no run defended back to the bowler
Symonds to Taylor, 2 runs full toss on off stump, driven through covers for one more
Symonds to Taylor, no run pitches on off stump and angles into Taylor who moves across to flick, he misses it and the ball thuds into the pad, Symonds appeals but Taufel says not out
Symonds to Taylor, 2 runs cut down to third man for two
Clarke to Oram, 1 run whipped away through midwicket for one
Clarke to Taylor, no run defended back to the bowler
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run driven down the ground for one
Clarke to Oram, 1 wide wide down leg side
Clarke to Oram, 1 run worked through square leg for a single
Clarke to Taylor, no run defended to midwicket on the front foot
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run they risk the single to short thrid man again, Johnson swoops down on it, picks up, throws on the move and hits the stumps at the batsman's end, Oram just makes his ground
Johnson to Taylor, no run good length ball first up, defended back to the bowler
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run fullish length on middle and leg, driven to long on for one
Johnson to Oram, no run good length ball on Oram's off stump, he moves across, covers the line an defends
Johnson to Oram, no run full length outside off stump, driven on the front foot to cover
Johnson to Oram, 1 run 140 kmh on off stump, Oram ekes it to point and sets off for a quick single
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run short of a length ball outside off stump, Taylor swats it over midwicket for a single
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run tossed up on middle and leg, driven down the ground to long on for one
Clarke to Oram, no run turned off the pads on the front foot to square leg
Clarke to Oram, 3 wide strays down leg side, wides signalled
Clarke to Oram, 2 runs
Clarke to Oram, 1 run driven down the ground for one
Clarke to Taylor, 1 run pushed on the front foot to covers for one
Clarke to Oram, 1 run
Johnson to Oram, no run bowled short of a length outside off stump, Oram tries to slash it through the off side but gets beaten
Johnson to Oram, no run a touch slower at 138kmh and in the blockhole, Oram gets his bat down in time to dig it out
Johnson to Oram, FOUR runs good length ball angling into Oram's middle and leg stump, he makes room and tries to slog it over the leg side, he gets an inside edge to the fine leg fence
Johnson to Oram, 1 run driven firmly off the front foot back down the ground for two more, Johnson pretends to pick it up on his follow through and fires in a fake throw
Johnson to Taylor, FOUR runs pitched full and outside leg stump, Taylor gets forward and flicks it over short fine leg for four
Johnson to Taylor, 1 wide bowled very wide outside off stump, Taufel signals a wide
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run good length ball on middle and off, pushed to mid-on for one
Clarke to Taylor, no run pitches on middle and off and spins away from Taylor who gets forward and close stheface to play to midwicket

Clarke to Taylor, OUT bowled him round his legs! Clarke angles that down leg side from round teh wicket, Taylor moves well across his stumps and tries to sweep, the ball pitches on leg stump and straightens, Taylor misses the sweep and has his stumps re-arranged!
Clarke to McCullum, no run defended on the front foot to point
Clarke to McCullum, 1 run short ball on middle and off, McCullum pulls it to deep midwicket to get off the mark
Clarke to Oram, no run Oram steps down the track and isn
Clarke to Oram, no run defended back to the bowler
McGrath to McCullum, 1 run good length ball on off stump, McCullum pushes it to mid-off on the back foot for a quick single
McGrath to Oram, no run McGrath tests Oram with the bouncer, it's not at any great pace so Oram swerves out of the way easily
McGrath to Oram, no run fuller length outside off stump, Oram began to make room adn then stopped, he stayed rooted to the crease and fished for it, the ball beat the edge
McGrath to Oram, 1 run pulled to deep midwicket for one
McGrath to McCullum, no run good length ball angling into middle stump from just outside off, McCullum defends to midwicket on the front foot
McGrath to McCullum, 1 run pushed in front of point on the back foot for a single, just three runs off the over, tidy return from McGrath
Clarke to McCullum, no run defended on the off side on the back foot
Clarke to McCullum, 1 run driven through cover for a single
Clarke to Oram, SIX runs that's a monstrous hit from Oram! He stepped down the track and used his very long arms to hoist it over deep midwicket
Clarke to Oram, SIX runs and another one, even bigger this time, Oram danced down and lofted him powerfully over deep mdiwicket once more
Clarke to Oram, FOUR runs and delicate this time, he moves across and paddles it fine using the pace of the ball, it runs away to fine leg
Clarke to Oram, no run Oram tries to reverse sweep but doesn

McGrath to McCullum, no run full and straight, McCullum drives hard back at the bowler, McGrath stretches out his right hand but can't get a touch on it, the ball hits the stumps at the other end, Oram was way out of his crease
McGrath to McCullum, 1 run played in front of point for one
McGrath to Oram, no run Oram backs away and tries to pull but that ball isn't short enough, he can't make contact
McGrath to Oram, SIX runs Oram makes contact with this one, and how! He backs away again and slams the pull shot high and far over square leg, gigantic hit!
McGrath to Oram, no run he backs away again and McGrath bowls a short one close to the body, Oram gets out of the way in time
McGrath to Oram, 1 run Oram tries to back away again, McGrath bowls the slower one outside off stump, Oram stops his initial movement and steers it down to third man
Bracken to Oram, FOUR runs full and straight at 141 kmh, Oram makes room and smashes it dead straight back past the bowler, Lee dived full length but couldn't get close
Bracken to Oram, 1 bye full outside off stump, Oram tries to run it to third man but misses
Bracken to McCullum, 1 run slower ball at 113 kmh, McCullum picks it and drives to long off for a single

Bracken to Oram, 2 runs Oram is beaten by the change in pace, he scoops it high over cover where Ponting runs backwards, looking over his head and dives to try and reach it, the ball is just out of reach
Bracken to Oram, 2 runs Oram lofts this over cover and places it extremely well to get two and reach his fifty, a superb and aggressive innings, can he take New Zealand close ...or even home?
Bracken to Oram, no run Bracken bowls another slower ball that lands up as a full toss, Oram swings hard at it but misses
McGrath to McCullum, 1 run full length ball on off and middle, McCullum gets forward and drives to long off for one
McGrath to Oram, 1 run excellent yorker on middle stump, Oram digs it out through covers for a single

McGrath to McCullum, (no ball) lovely short ball, that rose sharply from a length and McCullum fended at it outside the off stump, the ball whizzes past the face of the bat, he overstepped on that ocassion
McGrath to McCullum, 1 run full ball on off and middle, pushed into covers for one
McGrath to Oram, 1 run another one in the blockhole, Oram pushes into covers for one, Clarke sprints in and prevents the second
McGrath to McCullum, no run good length ball just outside off stump, McCullum tries to cut but it's too close to the body, the inside edge goes on the bounce to Gilchrist
McGrath to McCullum, FOUR runs take that says McCullum! He stands his ground and biffs McGrath flat over his head, that was hit so powerfully that it reached the fence on just the one bounce
Bracken to Oram, SIX runs fullt oss and Oram backs away and just pulls it down the ground and over the long-on fence, this is a stunning exhibition of power
Bracken to Oram, no run slower ball outside the off stump, Oram is beaten by the change in pace
Bracken to Oram, 1 run in the blockhole outside off stump, Oram digs it out to cover for one
Bracken to McCullum, 1 run slower ball at 110 kmh, angling in to McCullum from round the wicket, driven down the ground to long-on for one
Bracken to Oram, 1 run driven into the covers for a single
Bracken to McCullum, 1 run good length ball on off stump, McCullum dabs it to point for one
Lee to McCullum, no run good length angling into McCullum, defended on the front foot to midwicket
Lee to McCullum, no run excellent ball, 142kmh on a good length, McCullum plays half forward and the ball beats the outside edge
Lee to McCullum, 1 wide fired down leg side, wide called
Lee to McCullum, no run good length ball on off and middle stump, McCullum is caught on the crease and the ball cuts him in half
Lee to McCullum, 1 run slower ball on middle and leg, McCullum drives down the ground for one
Lee to Oram, no run short ball, Oram maoves away towards leg side and has a wild slash at it, he misses it completely

Lee to Oram, 1 run dropped! McGrath drops Oram at backward point. Oram tired to heave that over the off side, the ball got a top edge and swirled high in the air, McGrath misjudged it completely and didn't even get close to it

Johnson to Oram, 2 runs full and wide outside off stump, Oram drives wide of Ponting at cover, Symonds sprints on the fenc, slides, saves four and fires in the return flat and fast to prevent the third
Johnson to Oram, 1 run driven firmly to Symonds at long-off for one more
Johnson to McCullum, no run pitches on middle and off stump and angles across McCullum who tries to force it through the leg side, he misses
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run full on off stump, pushed down to long off for one more
Johnson to Oram, FOUR runs Oram picks that up from off and middle and slams it over midwicket for four
Johnson to Oram, 5 wide full toss down leg side, that was very wide and Gilchrist couldn't dive across and save it, five precious wides for New Zealand
Johnson to Oram, no run slower ball just outside off stump, Oram backs away and tries to force it through the off side but gets beaten
Lee to McCullum, 1 run short ball on off stump, McCullum moves away and tries to force it thorugh the off side, he gets an edge through midwicket
Lee to Oram, 1 run short of a length on middle and off, Oram tries to pull but doesn

Lee to McCullum, 1 run slower ball on off stump, McCullum spots it and slams it over cover, they run one and want the second, there's a massive mix-iup, the throw comes in to gilchrist who fires it at the bowlers end, everyone's safe in the end
Lee to Oram, 1 run scooped over point for a single, just wide of McGrath again
Lee to McCullum, FOUR runs outstanding shot, that was on a good length on off stump, McCullum backs away and cuts really hard past point, Hayden can't cut it off on the fence
Lee to McCullum, FOUR runs and again, McCullum backs away to make room and uses Lee's pace to cut him in the air and wide of the fielder at third man, 12 runs off the over, just what New Zealand need
McGrath to Oram, 1 run excellent ball in the blockhole, Oram can only squeeze it to cover for one
McGrath to McCullum, 1 run another one nearly in the blockhole, McCullum says NO but runs the single to cover anyway
McGrath to Oram, 1 run another outstanding yorker, Oram digs it down the ground for one more, New Zealand need boundaries
McGrath to McCullum, 1 run full toss, McCullum comes down and plays it to Ponting at midwicket, Ponting fires the throw in but can't stop the single
McGrath to Oram, 1 run another yorker and Oram digs it out again on the offside for one more
McGrath to McCullum, 1 run full ball on the pads, McCullum whips it off his legs to deep square leg, New Zealand get six singles off the over, they needed atleast 6 more
Lee to McCullum, 1 run McCullum slogs Lee in the air to midwicket, Ponting runs to his right and dives low and full length, he gets to the ball inches above the ground but can
Lee to Oram, 1 run driven to Ponting at cover for one more
Lee to McCullum, 1 run Lee tries to get it in the blockhole again, McCullum can

Lee to Oram, 2 runs superb fielding on the fence, Oram pulls a short one away to square leg, the ball has almost passed Hayden but he runs to his left, stretches out one hand and taps it back inside the fence
Lee to Oram, SIX runs massive blow! Oram gets under a full one and he powers it over the long-on fence, huge it, that was several rows back
Lee to Oram, 1 run short of a length ball on off stump, Oram backs away and cuts to deep point, 12 from the over
Bracken to Oram, 1 run low full toss on leg stump, Oram lofts it to long on for a single
Bracken to McCullum, 1 run Bracken fires it in the blockhole, McCullum drives it back tom Bracken who fumbles to allow the single&
Bracken to Oram, 2 runs full toss on off stump, Oram slices it in the air to long off where Symonds sprints in and dives forward trying to reach the catch, the ball bounces just short of him
Bracken to Oram, 1 run driven hard down the ground to long-on, Clarke runs to his right and fields superbly
Bracken to McCullum, 1 run full toss outside off stump, McCullum drives to Clarke at long-off
Bracken to Oram, 1 run another low full toss, Oram swings it away with one hand down to Clarke at long-on, just seven off that over, a good one from Bracken
McGrath to Oram, no run outstanding yorker, McGrath is as cool as they come, Oram defends it back to the bowler
McGrath to Oram, 1 run another one in the blockhole, Oram chips it to long-off for one, superb bowling, you won't see a better display of slog-over bowling
McGrath to McCullum, SIX runs this time it's full and McCullum gets underneath it and slams it over extra cover, a touch too full from Mcgrath and McCullum cashed in
McGrath to McCullum, 1 run the next one is in the blockhole again, McCullum digs it out on the leg side for one more
McGrath to Oram, 1 run another one nearly in the blockhole, Oram drives it to long-on for one more
McGrath to McCullum, 1 run low full toss on off and middle to end the over, McCullum forces it to cover and retains strike
Bracken to McCullum, 1 run full and angling into leg stump, McCullum drives to long-off for one
Bracken to Oram, SIX runs SIX! full toss, Oram slices it off the bat and gets enough meat on it to send it over symonds at long-off! Oram moves on to 96!

Bracken to Oram, 2 runs driven firmly down the ground to Clarke at long-on, they take on his arm and attempt the second, Oram just makes his ground as the throw comes in to the striker's end, the third umpire says not out, he's on 98.
Bracken to Oram, 2 runs that's Oram's hundred! An outstanding inninsg and he gets there by lofting it to Hayden at deep cover, take a bow Jacob Oram, he deserves all the applause he's getting
Bracken to Oram, 1 run low full toss, Oram swings it to Symonds at long-off for a single, Australia have this in the bag
Bracken to McCullum, FOUR runs McCullum swings a full toss over midwicket and gets four off the last ball, New Zealand fall short by nine runs

That's it from us at Cricinfo, we'll be back on Tuesday to bring you the action from Perth when England take on New Zealand. I'll been a pleasure bringing this exciting game to you, have a good evening. Cheers!
Ricky Ponting is the Player of the Match for his 111 off 122 balls. He added 200 runs for the second wicket with Hayden.

Matthew Hayden and Ricky Ponting set up the victory with twin centuries and Hussey provided an adrenalin-filled finish to spur Australia on to 343 for 5. It almost wasn't enough as Oram and McCullum took New Zealand closer but Glenn McGrath bowled a string of superb yorkers to stem the run f

John Buchanan had mentioned that Australia wanted a fight and they certainly got one today. Jacob Oram stretched them to the limit and New Zealand finished on 335 for 5. Who'd have thought they would have got so close when the chase started. Oram's hundred off 71 balls is the fastest by a Ne
Australia won by 8 runs
Player of the match is Ricky Ponting, AUS
